# Siegesbeckia pills. Honeyed pills prepared from Herba Siegesbeckiae ([[僿薟草]], [[稀薟草]], [[希薟草]], or [[豨薟草]]), used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to relieve rheumatism, to improve the motility of joints, and to counteract toxicity in the treatment of rheumatic arthralgia with aching and weakness of loins and knees, numbness of the limbs, hemiplegia, rubella, or sores with exudation".
